content: Hey, is there a standard way we have for setting the value of one of the crate-wide BuiltinAttributes via the rustc command line? Or does one currently have to add a command-line option for any such attribute that one might want to set? (Or even override, I'm supposing.)
there's a way to inject attributes I think
-Z crate-attr=val -- inject the given attribute in the crate
I'd guess it should work or if not that's a bug
the help there isn't really clear on the syntax for using it, but maybe it's everything inside [] normally?
(and yes, the embedded docs for it could be better. I had to try several things before I figured out a combo that worked.)
